description:
It would be cool to have quotas calculated automaticly, based on current available resource of the nodes. It can be "auto" config option with configurable multiplier for overcommitment of resources.
Most scheduler software like IBM LoadLeveler use dynamic quoting instead of fixed values.
title: Wishlist: Dynamic quotas based on compute node resources
